title: Greta Van Susteren Signs Multi-Year Renewal with Newsmax | Newsmax Media, Inc.

title: Greta Van Susteren Signs New Deal With Newsmax
snippet: Ashleigh Banfield To Lead True Crime Vertical For NewsNation, Will Depart Primetime Show · Donald Trump Signs Executive Order To Sideline State AI Laws ... Greta Van Susteren has signed a multi-year deal to continue hosting Newsmax‘s The Record with Greta Van Susteren.

title: Newsmax Inks Greta Van Susteren to Multi-Year Contract Extension - Barrett Media
snippet: Newsmax has announced it has signed anchor Greta Van Susteren to a new, multi-year contract extension to remain with the cable network.

title: Greta Van Susteren Signs Multi-Year Renewal with Newsmax
snippet: (NYSE:NMAX) ("Newsmax" or the "Company") today announced that veteran news anchor and broadcaster Greta Van Susteren has signed a multi-year extension to host "The Record with Greta Van Susteren."
